con:config.script:
import groovy.sql.Sql sql = Sql.newInstance("jdbc:sqlserver://BND-DAT-01.qa-fd.local\\DEVTEST;databaseName=MatrixAccounts;integratedSecurity=true", "", "", "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver")

type="groovy" name="Populate Create Transaction Scheme" id="9408abce-8f4f-4dfa-a887-8873713c6ec4"><con:settings/><con:config><script>import com.eviware.soapui.support.types.StringToStringMap;
import org.custommonkey.xmlunit.Diff
import org.custommonkey.xmlunit.XMLUnit
import groovy.xml.StreamingMarkupBuilder

// this object contains all the test case properties
def propertiesStep = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties")

// retrieve the number of transaction bindings
def bindingsCount = propertiesStep.getPropertyValue( "CreateTransactionBindings_Count" ).toInteger() 

// get the CreateTransactionScheme request as it is. Will be modified below
def request = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName('CreateTransactionScheme').getProperty('Request').getValue()

// get the XML of the request into a root object
def root = new XmlSlurper(false, true).parseText(request).declareNamespace('ns1':'http://data.matrix.financials.fivedegrees.nl/1.0', 'ns':'http://service.matrix.financials.fivedegrees.nl/1.0', 'xsi':'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance') 

// the XML fragment that contains all the transaction bindings
def tb = root.'**'.find{ it.name() == 'TransactionBindings' }

// remove all the existing transaction bindings on the request
tb.children().replaceNode{}

// loop through and add the bindings according to the property values
for(i=1;i<=bindingsCount;i++){
	// get the values for each binding from the properties with the relevant _i ending where i is value of the counter	
	def operationType = propertiesStep.getPropertyValue( "OperationType_" + i.toString() )
	def description= propertiesStep.getPropertyValue( "Description_" + i.toString() )
	def paymentType = propertiesStep.getPropertyValue( "PaymentType_" + i.toString() )	
	def paymentSource = propertiesStep.getPropertyValue( "PaymentSource_" + i.toString() )
	def paymentSubTypeId = propertiesStep.getPropertyValue( "PaymentSubTypeId_" + i.toString() )
	def counterAccountIdentifier = propertiesStep.getPropertyValue( "CounterAccountIdentifier_" + i.toString() )

	// add the XML fragment for transactionbinding i
	tb.appendNode {
    		"ns1:CreateTransactionBindingItem"{
        		"ns1:Description"(description)
        		"ns1:OperationType"(operationType)
        		// If the payment type is empty or missing then a nil syntax is added
        		if (paymentType?.trim()) {"ns1:PaymentType"(paymentType)}
        			else {"ns1:PaymentType"('xsi:nil' : 'true', 'xmlns:xsi' : 'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance')}
        		// If the payment source or payment sub type is empty or missing then the tags are not added
			if (paymentSource?.trim()) {"ns1:PaymentSource"(paymentSource)}
			if (paymentSubTypeId?.trim()) {"ns1:PaymentSubTypeId"(paymentSubTypeId)}
        		"ns1:CounterAccountIdentifier"(counterAccountIdentifier)
        		"ns1:Ratio"('1')
    		}
	}
}

// generate the XML request and add it to the test step
testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName('CreateTransactionScheme').setPropertyValue('Request', groovy.xml.XmlUtil.serialize( root ));</script></con:config></con:testStep><con:testStep type="request" name="CreateTransactionScheme" id="86fff379-a1d2-4a48-ab6b-3bb775c06c9e"><con:settings/><con:config xsi:type="con:RequestStep" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><con:interface>IProductBuilder_Endpoint</con:interface><con:operation>CreateTransactionScheme</con:operation><con:request name="CreateTransactionScheme" id="9c4f188f-ede8-44f2-acd5-b11712b55298"><con:settings><con:setting id="com.eviware.soapui.impl.wsdl.WsdlRequest@request-headers"><entry key="Authorization" value="Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsIng1dCI6ImEzck1VZ01Gdjl0UGNsTGE2eUYzekFrZnF1RSIsImtpZCI6ImEzck1VZ01Gdjl0UGNsTGE2eUYzekFrZnF1RSJ9..H3PUyg-t2Pg6BWbfhwOHJBngnu7U3CY33-OZ6Ao5CVQg1kmMArEWRY1HmfdfHhdmG-4Sx2MbDh_yetLpZf2sZF2iG3-q_yAPnEGlMwZC5_eLTMZs3gSXGhwqbd1bNwgwsGIZV1qZjr-FXi1wB5uO0MWwSCOIqI-VNRJOgImEKq2h6kORL2hPCOANFhKquwkMAb1ZeU10_I29yWOIG0H0N5I0pl3MyXiiUaBBr06bo9UOg5wFfV_GxMoNigHfFSxp8nPGdoeDm5EtCyeH23YYnh4AkDjmbiseHtTABdc0XlEYD03QEBOKfB1KkuFfMSeZrpRxrO9uK_ytgPNfM8iFKQ" xmlns="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"/></con:setting></con:settings><con:encoding>UTF-8</con:encoding><con:endpoint>https://localhost:44309/Service.svc</con:endpoint><con:request><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

	headers.put("Authorization",token)
